entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches developing early this evening. Wind north 30 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 6:16 PM MDT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of drizzle. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of drizzle late in the morning and in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. High plus 2. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:16 PM MDT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of drizzle. Low minus 1. POP 30%
